input.modelValue: Emitted when the input value changes (v-model support).

countryPicker.groups: An object to organize countries into specific categories (e.g., EU, ASEAN)
countryPicker.hasSortedOptions: By default, options are sorted alphabetically. If false, countries are sorted by priority in the order groups → favorites → include → fallback-locale translations, preserving the defined order.

datePicker.autoApply: Automatically apply date selection without needing confirm button
datePicker.enableTimePicker: Enable time selection in addition to date selection
datePicker.teleport: Teleport the date picker dropdown to a specific element

input.disabled: If true, the input will be disabled and non-interactive
input.label: Text label to display above the input field
input.modelValue: The current value of the input (v-model support)
input.name: Name attribute for the input field and validation
input.options: Options for input validation using validator.js
input.placeholder: Placeholder text for the input field
input.type: HTML input type (text, password, email, etc.)

select.countryCode: The ISO country code to display (e.g., 'US', 'GB')
select.exclude: An array of country codes to remove from the list.
select.fallbackLocale: Locale used when active locale translation is missing.
select.favorites: An array of country codes to prioritize and display at the top of the list.
select.flags: If true, displays country flags alongside country names
select.flagsPath: Custom function to resolve image paths for flags
select.flagsPosition: Position of the flags relative to the country name
select.flagsStyle: Shape of the flags to be displayed
select.hasSortedOption: If true, the options will be sorted alphabetically.
select.include: An array of country codes (e.g., ['US', 'DE']). Only these countries will be visible.
select.includeFavorites: If false, removes favorite items from the main list.
select.locales: Additional translation catalogues to be supported
select.multiple: If true, allows selecting multiple countries
select.showFlag: If false, the flag will not be displayed

textarea.cols: Number of visible text columns for the textarea.
textarea.rows: Number of visible text rows for the textarea.

country.default: Slot to customize the rendering of content

countryPicker.option: Slot to customize the rendering of each country option

password.icon: Slot for custom icon inside the password input field.

currencyPicker.invalid: Please select at least one valid option

daysInput.invalid: Please provide number of days within a year

datePicker.invalid: Please provide a present or past date

input.length: Input must be exactly {length} characters long
input.min: Title must be at least {length} character(s)
input.required: The field should not be empty

multiselect.invalid: Please select atleast one valid option

number.invalid: Please provide a number between 1 to 100

password.min: Password must be at least {length} character(s)

switch.invalid: The switch value must be true

label.accept: Accept the terms and conditions to proceed
label.dailySynchro: Select the sections that should be in the daily synchro
label.deliverableList: A list of your daily deliverables
label.multiselectWithKeys: Multiselect with label and value keys
label.title: Title

subtitle.checkbox: The CheckboxInput component is a versatile and reusable component that supports both single and multiple checkbox selections. It allows for customization through a variety of props and handles validation, error messages, and helper texts.
subtitle.country: Country shows the selected country with internationalization support.
subtitle.countryPicker: Country picker is a reusable component for selecting single or multiple countries with internationalization support and search functionality.
subtitle.datePicker: The date picker component is a customizable date selection component with time selection and form validation support
subtitle.email: The email input component is a input field designed for email addresses, featuring customizable labels, placeholders, error messages, schema validation, and reactive model binding.
subtitle.input: A versatile form input component with validation support using Zod and vee-validate
subtitle.number: A number input component is a form input field that allows users to enter, increment, or decrement numerical values with validation.
subtitle.password: The password component is a specialized input field for password entry, featuring a toggle to show or hide the password, customizable labels, placeholders, error messages, schema validation, and reactive model binding.
subtitle.text: The text input component is a form field that allows users to enter and edit textual content with validation
subtitle.textarea: The textarea input component is a multi-line text input field that allows users to enter and edit larger blocks of text, with support for validation, error messages, and customizable properties such as rows and columns.
